summary: Gives all vendors more gold and 1 day restock.
descriptionHtml:
Simple mod to give all merchants more gold and 1 day restock.

Few versions to choose from: 
- x2, x3, x5 and x10 - vendors will have X times more gold than in vanilla,
- 2k, 5k, 10k and 20k - all vendors will have exact amount of gold.
- 1 day restock changes only restocking.
All versions have implemented 1 day restock.
NoFences versions won\'t edit fences, so in case you have problems with Thieves Guild quest line try to use those.

Supports NMM installation! Created using Creation Kit!
author: RivvqPL

files.name: Golden Vendors NMM
files.changelogHtml:
Added few versions.
Supports Nexus Mod Manager installation.
Created using Creation Kit!
